about_the_game:
The end of the night, the end of the situation, since then —— peace of mind.

"The Bait：Tide" is a 3D first-person adventure narrative game based on a relic exploration, taking from the worldview of the series prequels, Hui Men and Too Yin.
"In the ancient times of flood and wilderness, heaven and earth were chaotic with only fog and dew flowing in them. Then fog the sea, sea pregnant fish, call them mirages."

The sudden visit of a mysterious anchorman awakens An xin's memories of her childhood hometown, which is a small coastal town in the east called Yichuan. Yichuan all the year round, mist and rain, its people in ancient times to fishing for pearl fishing camp. And to the mysterious death of the red woman in the fierce building as the source of childhood memory fragments gradually wake up...
The tomb of the king of West Zhou lying in the sea reappeared in the world, and all kinds of forces with evil intentions came by the waves. Who is your friend and who is your enemy? Organs heavy than people's organs to do, both with you, easy to reverse life bureau!

An immersive dubbing or performance:
The whole process, full role dubbing, superb first-person performance and interaction design together create a movie-grade audio-visual feast, bringing you an immersive adventure experience. Multi-choice, multi-branch narrative, companion fate and final outcome will be your own choice.

Complex and varied scene levels, thrilling escape experience:
Escape will be the core action element of the game. The deep coral reef, the end of the tomb is the mysterious palace or dark crossbow? ... Combined with complex and varied terrain levels, fully integrated into climbing, jumping, rope grabbing, diving and other gameplay design, to bring you a full flow, brilliant adventure journey.

Unique Chinese ghosts, restore the sea king tomb "thousand years of secrets" :
Water charm, sharks, dumpling pythons, armored tomb generals... The grotesque danger, full of Chinese characteristics of the monster design, the demons are pouring in. From the East China Sea reef began to toss and turn, invite you to embark on this journey of a near-death escape, uncover the mysterious secret behind the hundred years of the past......

The complex relationship between characters and the main storyline with lots of suspense:
A hundred years ago, a mysterious young man came to visit the house and brought the strangers An family and Lu family together. The legendary god killer, I do not know the depth of the family, who is the enemy of who? In the thick of the situation, how should you choose, how to get out of trouble......
